name: Envious
passiveSkills: Immune to all Corruption, Blind, Accuracy Down, Stun and Sleep effects, including Silver effects
Steal All Golden Effects from a random enemy and prevent them from gaining Golden Effects until they die at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver effects, from self if any enemy lacks negative effects at the start of battle and at the start of your turn
35% Chance to Copy All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, from a random ally to self when you take damage
75% Chance to counterattack when anyone on your team takes damage.
